p: In Mathiasen et al.'s study, a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial, patients with severe ischemic heart failure were randomized 2:1 to intra-myocardial injections of MSC or placebo, respectively. Like in our study, no differences were found in the QoL that was measured by the Kansas City Cardiomyopathy Questionnaire between the study group and placebo. However, unlike in our study, there were significant improvements in LVEF of 6.2% in the study group compared with the placebo and no differences were found in NYHA class [ 20].
